column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Just amazing. First time in Chicago
column2: first time trying the deep dish pizza and I couldn't have chosen a better place to do it. I wasn't sure I'd like deep dish because I'm not a big fan of gooey or overcrowded pizza
column3: but this place gives you exactly what you want. You can order your pizza well done or gooey
column4: or even ask them to go easy on some ingredients of you're not a fan of having pounds and pounds of cheese
column5: or sauce or anything else for that matter. They do take a while
column6: but it's well worth it. The garlic bread is superb
column7: and the mozzarella sticks are just perfect. Service? Impeccable! This is a place where locals go
